[i]Even though the Multiplanar Festival of Arts only happens yearly, it promotes unity and joint focus year round.[/i]
[i]Chesi's dangers come from within, with scheming sabotage and lurking Banished.[/i]
[i]Enori's capital building powers the rest of the city with marble magitech engines.[/i]
[i]The Vitin Academy's doors are open to everyone, provided they can keep up.[/i]
[i]Every laboratory has a personal touch. A cute plant, a warm drink, a soft cot.[/i]
[i]While no one in Akieva is found wanting for food or shelter, some still manage to do better than others.[/i]
[i]Rilken stands, surrounded by malignant wilderness, protected by a shimmering forcefield.[/i]
[i]Some of the abandoned cities outside of the Kelian League lie dormant, with security systems still operational.[/i]
[i]Only the best and the brightest can even test for acceptance at Polgek Academy.[/i]
[i]Dekal's library is twenty stories tall, with six subbasements, containing millions of books and hundreds of labs.[/i]
